resources.string: Please fill out all fields in the form.
How long have you been homeless?

We need to take a picture of you for our records. When you touch the \"Take Picture\" button below, a camera app will open. Please position the camera directly in front of you and then press the white circle button at the bottom of the screen to take your picture.
What city did you reside in before you became homeless?"
If you were not in Rolla when you became homeless, what was the primary reason for coming to Rolla?
If you chose other, explain below:
Tap here to input city name
Tap here to input your \"other\" reason
Please read the following lines and press the checkbox next to each to indicate that you agree:
I understand that the information provided will be kept confidential and only authorized staff of The Rolla Mission will review this information.
I understand that The Rolla Mission may release my name, date of birth, photo, and dates of overnight stay to Probation and Parole and the Rolla Police Department upon their request for information.
No information will be released to any other agencies or individuals without my written or expressed consent.

You are now registered with The Rolla Mission as a patron! You still need to check-in for tonight. To check in, touch the button below. On the next screen, search for your name and then touch your picture.
